forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High around 25C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 78F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High near 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 69F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 19C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 67F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 68F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 68F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
